verses.verse: Ah <S%H1945><s%>, the land <S%H776><s%> of the rustling <S%H6767><s%> of wings <S%H3671><s%>, which is beyond <S%H5676><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> of Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%>;

that sendeth <S%H7971><s%> ambassadors <S%H6735><s%> by the sea <S%H3220><s%>, even in vessels <S%H3627><s%> of papyrus <S%H1573><s%> upon <S%H6440><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%>, saying <S%H3212><s%>, Go, ye swift <S%H7031><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%>, to a nation <S%H1471><s%> tall <S%H4900><s%> and smooth <S%H4178><s%>, to a people <S%H5971><s%> terrible <S%H3372><s%> from their beginning onward <S%H1973><s%>, a nation <S%H1471><s%> that meteth out <S%H6978><s%> and treadeth down <S%H4001><s%>, whose land <S%H776><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> divide <S%H958><s%>!

All ye inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%>, and ye dwellers <S%H7931><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%>, when an ensign <S%H5251><s%> is lifted up <S%H5375><s%> on the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, see <S%H7200><s%> ye <S%H7782><s%>; and when the trumpet is blown <S%H8628><s%>, hear ye <S%H8085><s%>.

For thus <S%H3541><s%> hath Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H8252><s%>, I will be still, and I will behold <S%H5027><s%> in my dwelling-place <S%H4349><s%>, like clear <S%H6703><s%> heat <S%H2527><s%> in sunshine <S%H216><s%>, like a cloud <S%H5645><s%> of dew <S%H2919><s%> in the heat <S%H2527><s%> of harvest <S%H7105><s%>.

For before <S%H6440><s%> the harvest <S%H7105><s%>, when the blossom <S%H6525><s%> is over <S%H8552><s%>, and the flower <S%H5328><s%> becometh a ripening <S%H1580><s%> grape <S%H1155><s%>, he will cut off <S%H3772><s%> the sprigs <S%H2150><s%> with pruning-hooks <S%H4211><s%>, and the spreading branches <S%H5189><s%> will he take away <S%H5493><s%> and cut down <S%H8456><s%>.

They shall be left <S%H5800><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> unto the ravenous birds <S%H5861><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and to the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>; and the ravenous birds <S%H5861><s%> shall summer <S%H6972><s%> upon them <S%H929><s%>, and all the beasts of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall winter upon them <S%H2778><s%>.

In that time <S%H6256><s%> shall a present <S%H7862><s%> be brought <S%H2986><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> from a people <S%H5971><s%> tall <S%H4900><s%> and smooth <S%H4178><s%>, even from a people <S%H5971><s%> terrible <S%H3372><s%> from their beginning onward <S%H1973><s%>, a nation <S%H1471><s%> that meteth out <S%H6978><s%> and treadeth down <S%H4001><s%>, whose land <S%H776><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> divide <S%H958><s%>, to the place <S%H4725><s%> of the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>, the mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>.
